attributes.action: Uphold the 15 points penalty on Leeds United
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Leeds United, through their own mis-management, had their CVA rejected due to being unable to appease both the IR and the Football League.  This was nobody else's fault but Leeds United.  They were then allowed to enter the competition at the start of the season as long as they agreed to a 15 point deduction.  They agreed and are now fighting against the agreement they signed.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
